name: Cod fish
instructions:
1)Soak the code fish in water at least 4 hours before to remove the salt. Change the water every hour.
2)Boil the cod fish for about 20 minutesor until it is soft to eat
3)Add sliced onion, olive oil, black olive, red and yellow peppers to a large pan
4)Add the cod once the mixture is smother

Note: You can serve it with cauliflower rice
additionalInfo: I got this recipe from my mother-in-law. It originally has potatos on it so I just removed it and now we have a keto version.
